paper_abstract: The stochastic matching problem with applications in online dating and kidney exchange was introduced by Chen et al. (2009) [1] together with a simple greedy strategy. They proved it is a 4-approximation, but conjectured that the greedy algorithm is in fact a 2-approximation. In this paper we confirm this hypothesis. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Improved analysis of the greedy algorithm for stochastic matching
